name: The Playground (prairiedogseeksheart)
description:
These games are ONLINE ONLY multiplayer! Internet connection is required!

The Playground is a sandbox of various multiplayer game prototypes. This is meant purely for testing purposes and to hopefully find a few prototypes that are worth moving forward into actual production. 

DISCLAIMER: These games are prototypes only. As such, there may be bugs and unfinished portions.
